title: Discord bot
description: Development of a basic moderation bot for Discord.
context: With 20 different commands and a database, it performs a few basic moderation actions on a small server.

title: Booki
description: This is OpenClassrooms' first project. It provides an opportunity to discover web tools and practices through a mock-up project. The mock-up is created in HTML and CSS using Figma.
context: Booki is a start-up that wants to develop a website enabling users to find accommodation and activities in the city of their choice. Sarah, the CTO prepared a base for me to complete with the mock-up elements prepared by Lo√Øc, the UI designer.Sarah entrusted me with the task of integrating the site's interface in HTML and CSS into a web mock-up, while preserving the given structure.
